content: The `Progress` component displays a linear progress bar. It can be determinate (by passing a `value`) or `isIndeterminate`. It's important to provide an `aria-label` for accessibility if no visible `label` is present.
Progress bars can be styled with different `sizes` and `colors`. A `isStriped` prop can be added for a striped appearance.
You can add a `label` to the progress bar. To display the current value, use the `showValueLabel` prop. The format of the value can be customized with `formatOptions`.
Key stylable slots include `base`, `track`, `indicator`, `label`, and `value` (for the value label).
